name: Wild Arms XF [PSP]
description:
Come along with an all-new cast and storyline as a favorite RPG series goes portable! Dive into an intriguing tale in which one family’s personal vendetta grows into an epic struggle to save the world!
- Experience a deep strategic adventure featuring over 60 stages plus many optional battles.
- Customize your party with over 20 unique and varied job classes.
- Create powerful weapons, armor, and spell books from rare minerals scavenged by your hired mercenaries.
- Enjoy the game’s soundtrack at any time with the bonus Music Library.
